content.text: You have a talent for writing; your teachers and friends have always told you as much, you were great at the college publication, and you’ve written your friends’ resumes with great results. You’ve even put some effort into making a living out writing freelance for the local paper and your company’s newsletter. Making some steady cash out of your writing skills, though, has proven elusive. You’ve never managed to put a proper strategy together. What should you do?
